item.title: Killing Ron Brown: A Clinton Crime Family Story
item.description: Your life is in danger. At this moment, a Chinese nuclear warhead sits in a missile silo. Its guidance, if launched, instructs the warhead to detonate a mile or two above your home. And this was all made possible by extortion, murder, and illegal campaign contributions to Bill and Hillary Clinton. Remember Ron Brown? Brown was Clinton’s Secretary of Commerce. Ron Brown ran the Clintons’ extortion racket in the 1990s.
